name: Earth Savior Super Fighting Robo
description:
Space to start the game and to fire you double fist missiles. W and S to turn left and right respectively.

I decided to make a change for once and work mostly on art rather than gameplay. This game was made for the Mini Jam 114: Anime^2 with the limitation of "Locked in place. So the super fighting robot is unfortunately locked to the center of the screen unable to do like a good mecha would and fly into space to punch and kick the alien menace. So now we must rely on his rocket fist.
